ai-patthana1.20:94.1_0: There is no reason for nine reasons in the realm of luminous objects, three, four, five, three, five, six, seven, eight, nine faculties, the five constituents (of mind and bodily form). There is no places in between the seventh section and the unprofitable paths, the three essences associated with each other. There is no particular components.
ai-patthana1.20:96.1_0: The section on the past objects is finished.
